*Ni (Z = 28) Atomic weight: /A_r / = 58.69000 g mol^-1 *   Nominal
density:   /ρ/ (g cm^-3 ) = 8.8760
    /σ//_a /(barns/atom) = [/μ///ρ/](cm^2 g^-1 )  ×  9.74571E+01 
    /E/(eV) [/μ///ρ/](cm^2 g^-1 ) = /f/_2 (/e/ atom^-1 )  ×  7.16993E+05
